TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Suddenly you also have better taste in guitars, but you can't afford the XXJJL magic guitar that's for sale at Walmart.

I wish for an XXJJL magic guitar.

Granted. However, the phoenix feather in your magic guitar comes from same phoenix that gave a feather for the guitar of the dark lord, who sorely dislikes competition.

I wish to be capable of making any object, including my own body, invisible or visible at will.

Granted, but you forgot how to make yourself un-invisible after you became invisible.

I wish for my wishes to not be corrupted wishes when I am wishing for Steam Sales.

Granted. They aren't actually granted anyways.

I wish for a ship loader... engineer.

Denied.

I wish ERB Season 4 would come out soon.

Granted, but [DENIED].

I wish people would follow the rules.

Granted. Sun is, apparently, a celestial body.

I wish for two ship loader... engineers.

Granted, but Jeb blows it all up.

I wish for rof hsiw I

Granted. The Wish Fairy summons a Meta Fairy Wisher, which creates an endless loop. You never get any more wishes.

I wish for Scott Manley to be spelled with more fairies in the middle.

Granted. It is now spelled "Scott Fairy Fairy Fairy Manley." The fairies in the middle will disappear one by one as he uses his three wishes.

I wish peanut butter wasn't so expensive in Chicago.

Granted. It's cheaper because it's liquid mud.

I wish I could do anything and get away with it.

Granted, but now you get bored in a few hours.

I wish I didn't have to make a wish after corrupting someone else's wish.

Granted, but everyone else's wishes come true uncorrupted.

I wish Earth was in the Star Wars galaxy.

Death Star attack.

I wish for mud

Granted. You watch in horror as the boots of a girl get hopelessly stuck in it, with her struggling mightily to make any headway.

(Not sure I corrupted that, I feel vaguely dirty now.)

I wish for a MAME-emulator arcade cabinet.

You get one, but you can't play it without being sucked inside Tron-style.

I wish I didn't have to go to class in like five minutes.

granted, but its because you broke your legs

I wish that kerbals could land and not kill us all or accidently destroy the world

Granted, but they accidentally kill us all.

I wish I was the girl in the pink boots:

Granted. You get bored and leave the mud.

I wish that my legs were the wrong sizes.

granted, they are now so big that your heart can't pump enough blood through them, they (and the feet) become paralyzed until you take back your wish.

I wish i could take a few more days off...

Granted. Here's the pink slip.

I wish that Star Wars Battlefront comes out sooner.

It comes out right now, but the models are all half-done, the textures are minimal at best, and all of the mechanics are completely unbalanced.

Not that it would be any different on the planned release date anyway. Ohh, burn.

I wish I only had to eat half the food per day that I do now, thus allowing me to spend less time eating and more time studying without falling asleep from lack of energy.

Granted. You are now a wolf, and only require half the food that humans do.

I wish for procedurally generated galactic structures.

Granted, but they are invisible, so they almost don't exist.

I wish I was there when the video in my signature was made.

You were there, but 'there' is not easily quantified and in this case refers to being within a 100,000-kilometer sphere of the location when the video was made.

Granted. You are now a wolf, and only require half the food that humans do.

That's not even a corruption. Wolves are awesome.
